Develop and deliver a portfolio of ICT, Knowledge, Transparency and Resilience services, products and programmes across Defra, e.g. end-user IT services (desktop/laptop, business applications, audio/video conferencing, related service management and user training - to 11,000 staff across core and wider Network), library and translation services, advice on FOI, information assurance and the provision of physical and personnel security. We deliver the Government’s digital agenda, seeking to transform customer experience through the deployment of digital technologies, implementing digital solutions to business problems (e.g. digital engagement and transactions, collaboration, information analysis, and synthesis in support of scientific research and policy development).
